alert.note: Alert for Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 18 at 3:41PM CDT until May 18 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Texas County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 341 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles south of Wilburton, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Hough. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
